description: Deletes the specified policy from your organization. Before you perform this operation, you must first detach the policy from all organizational units (OUs), roots, and accounts. This operation can be called only from the organization's management account or by a member account that is a delegated administrator.

parameters.name: PolicyId
parameters.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the policy that you want to delete. You can get the ID from the  ListPolicies or  ListPoliciesForTarget operations. The regex pattern for a policy ID string requires 'p-' followed by from 8 to 128 lowercase or uppercase letters, digits, or the underscore character (_).
